title: WF-EX-003: SmartLink baseline Schemas vs MOVA pack
description: Compare the human baseline SmartLink Schemas (rules/default/global/meta) with the MOVA SmartLink pack from WF_LAB_08.

metrics.name: Workflow coverage
metrics.description: How well the schema/envelope set describes the full SmartLink workflow (config -> routing -> logging/reporting).

metrics.name: Clarity for operator
metrics.description: How easy it is for an operator/agent to understand and configure SmartLink using the provided schemas/envelopes.

metrics.name: Runtime readiness
metrics.description: Whether fields are sufficient to wire into a real runtime (edge worker / redirector) without guessing missing parts.

metrics.name: Evolution flexibility
metrics.description: How easily the schema/envelope set can be extended for new features (A/B, scheduling, limits, staged rollouts).

constraints: No changes to baseline SmartLink schemas; comparison only.
Focus on data contracts (schemas/envelopes), not runtime code.
Stay within MOVA lab layer; no core/mova edits.
